DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying tissue sample laboratory participant receive treatment Selenium Vitamin E Cancer Prevention Trial ( SELECT ) SWOG-S0000 may help doctor predict participant 's response treatment help plan best treatment . PURPOSE : This phase III trial study effect vitamin E and/or selenium colorectal polyp men enrol SELECT Trial SWOG-S0000 .
DOC.brief_title: S0000D : Effect Vitamin E and/or Selenium Colorectal Polyps Men Enrolled SELECT Trial SWOG-S0000
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To assess effect selenium colorectal adenoma ( CRA ) occurrence . - To assess effect selenium number , location , size , histologic type , degree dysplasia CRA . - To assess effect selenium colorectal cancer ( CRC ) incidence . Secondary - To assess effect vitamin E CRA occurrence . - To assess effect vitamin E CRC incidence . Tertiary - To explore effect modification selenium vitamin E aspirin CRA occurrence . - To explore effect modification selenium vitamin E body mass index . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Endoscopically obtained tissue sample review study pathologist confirm presence ( absence ) colorectal adenoma ( CRA ) . If CRA present , number , location , size , histology , degree dysplasia document . The CRA also review exclude diagnosis colorectal cancer . Additional data , include aspirin use , height weight , date birth , demographic baseline characteristic , also obtain . Participants ' medical record review periodically . Participants follow annually .
